name: js-exercises
description: Hand-in for International Web Dev Cphbusiness

scripts.all: npm i && npm run cli && npm run site
scripts.cli: tsx cli/day-1/functions-objects.ts && tsx cli/day-1/classes.ts && tsx cli/day-1/arrays.ts && tsx cli/day-1/arrays-objects.ts && tsx cli/day-3/loops-arrays.ts && tsx cli/day-3/conditionals.ts && tsx cli/day-3/higher-lower.ts
scripts.site: echo "You can also visit https://roman-octavian.github.io/I-wed-en-0924a-Sem1-js-ex/ for the deployment instead" && live-server ./site

author: Octavian Roman
